body:
FB Financial Corporation (NYSE:FBK) announced its quarterly earnings results on Thursday. The company reported $0.43 earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter, beating the Zacks’ consensus estimate of $0.41 by $0.02.

FB Financial Corporation (NYSE:FBK) opened at 24.99 on Friday. FB Financial Corporation has a 12-month low of $19.81 and a 12-month high of $28.04. The firm’s 50-day moving average is $25.83 and its 200 day moving average is $23.26. The stock has a market capitalization of $599.14 million and a P/E ratio of 8.51.

FBK has been the subject of a number of research analyst reports. Keefe, Bruyette & Woods initiated coverage on shares of FB Financial Corporation in a report on Tuesday, October 11th. They issued an “outperform” rating and a $25.00 price target for the company. Zacks Investment Research upgraded shares of FB Financial Corporation from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating and set a $30.00 target price for the company in a report on Monday, January 9th. J P Morgan Chase & Co initiated coverage on shares of FB Financial Corporation in a report on Tuesday, October 11th. They set a “neutral” rating and a $23.00 target price for the company. Finally, Sandler O’Neill initiated coverage on shares of FB Financial Corporation in a report on Tuesday, October 11th. They set a “hold” rating for the company.

Institutional investors have recently made changes to their positions in the stock. SG Americas Securities LLC purchased a new position in shares of FB Financial Corporation during the third quarter valued at about $111,000. Morgan Stanley purchased a new position in shares of FB Financial Corporation during the third quarter valued at about $257,000. Gilder Gagnon Howe & Co. LLC purchased a new position in shares of FB Financial Corporation during the third quarter valued at about $264,000. Victory Capital Management Inc. purchased a new position in shares of FB Financial Corporation during the third quarter valued at about $505,000. Finally, Laurion Capital Management LP purchased a new position in shares of FB Financial Corporation during the third quarter valued at about $706,000. 23.84% of the stock is owned by institutional investors.

title: FB Financial Corporation (FBK) Posts Earnings Results, Beats Estimates By $0.02 EPS
